Text: Very impressive with the Tony Millionaire and Jason books (thanks again) but how about a real challenge? The Moomin books by Tove Jansson?

That is a real challenge, because I don't have any of them, and it doesn't look like I'll be finding any of them anytime soon (short of purchasing and scanning myself, which probably isn't going to happen).
